channel.title: Codes for dragon arrows and dragon claws?
channel.description: Can anyone give me the codes for dragon fire arrows or just dragon arrows and dragon claws? Also if you have a list of new codes please give.

item.title: Codes for dragon arrows and dragon claws?
item.dc:creator: @bloodmaniet bloodmaniet
item.description:
@bloodmaniet wrote:

d1215:

Can anyone give me the codes for dragon fire arrows or just dragon arrows and dragon claws? Also if you have a list of new codes please give.

1.) all custom items are found in class8.java of your client.
2.) you can easily go to edit and find and type in “Dragon claws”
3.) before you ask what it will look like it will look like this and ill point out the item id for my client.

if(i == 13664)
{
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wear”;
class8.anInt174 = 14102;// Drop/Inv Model
class8.anInt165 = 14103;// Male Wield Model
class8.anInt200 = 14103;// Female Wield
class8.anInt181 = 800;// Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller
class8.anInt190 = 498;// Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards
class8.anInt198 = 1300;// Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right
class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right
class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up
class8.aString170 = “Dragon claws”; // Item Name
class8.aByteArray178 = "A powerful vicious tool ".getBytes(); // Item Examine
}

The item id for dragon claws will be in the place of 13664 in that code.
same will be done for dragon arrows… if you have them added…properly

Read full topic
